sentences.sentence: Some days are best frogotten. Today ain't one of them. Come on.
sentences.translation: 有些日子最好忘记，但是今天却不能忘记。 来吧！

sentences.sentence: Winners lose more than losers, because they stay in the game.
sentences.translation: 胜利者比失败者输得场次更多，因为他们一直留在赛场上。

sentences.sentence: What drains your spirit drains your body. What fuels your spirit fuels your body.
sentences.translation: 消耗你心灵的事物也会消耗你的健康，滋补你心灵的事物也会滋补你的身体。

sentences.sentence: You have to learn to love yourself.
There was a good, new smell in the air, a smell of earth waking after its long sleep.
sentences.translation: 空气中有一种美好的，清新的气息，大地在长睡后醒来时的气息。
